Miller (Ọnwa Septemba 14, afọ 1909 - rụọ ọnwa Septemba 6, afọ 1997) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
Ọ bụ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke Biological Photographers Association.
Miller nwetara nzere Bachelor nke Science na Home Economics site na Hampton Institute n'afọ 1934, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ kụziri ihe ruo afọ asatọ na usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke North Carolina

N'afọ 1943, ọ debanyere aha na Women's Army Corps (WAC). Miller bụ onye na-ese foto nwere ahụmahụ, ọ ghọkwara nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ gafere ule State Board of Photographers, yana nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka nke mbụ jere ozi na ngalaba foto nke WAC. Miller hapụrụ ndị agha dị ka onye isi
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, e liri ya na Arlington National Cemetery.
